name: The Ballad Of The Hornswaggler
description:
You are the Hornswaggler and you are innocent, and yet you rot in prison. Reflect on who has wronged you and what might have led them to this. Reflect yourself as the Hornswaggler does, for a lack of lengthy self-reflection on ones own sins and failings leads only to oblivion.

You may take action when you think you've reflected enough, though beware haste, for ones perceptions may be incomplete.

It's terrible.

Big ups to the Warwick Game Design Society. Top fellas down there I'll tell ya.

Music from Bensound (www.bensound.com)
